SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.websocket

Class IndividualMessageWebSocket

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.websocket.IndividualMessageWebSocket
@ApplicationScoped public class IndividualMessageWebSocket extends Object
IndividualMessageWebSocket handles WebSocket connections for individual chat messages. This class manages WebSocket connections, validates users, processes incoming messages, and sends notifications for individual chat messages.
See Also:
  • IndividualMessageBean
  • NotificationBean
  • SessionBean
  • WebSocketMessageDto

      sessionToken - The session token used for authentication.

    • markAsRead

      public void markAsRead(com.google.gson.JsonObject json) throws IOException
      Marks messages as read for a user.
      Parameters:
      json - The JSON object containing the message IDs to mark as read.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • receiveSendMessage

      public void receiveSendMessage(jakarta.websocket.Session session, com.google.gson.JsonObject json) throws IOException, UserNotFoundException
      Receives and sends an individual message.
      Parameters:
      session - The WebSocket session.
      json - The JSON object containing the message data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      UserNotFoundException - If the user is not found.
